name: Account Management
description: Focuses on building and maintaining long-term relationships with existing customers to ensure customer satisfaction and loyalty.

name: B2B Sales
description: Specializes in selling products or services to other businesses, often involving complex sales processes and long-term contracts.

name: B2C Sales
description: Concentrates on selling products or services directly to individual consumers, typically through retail or e-commerce channels.

name: Channel Sales
description: Manages sales through third-party partners, such as distributors, resellers, or agents, to expand market reach and revenue.

name: Consultative Sales
description: Emphasizes understanding customers' needs and providing tailored solutions, often involving complex sales processes and high-value transactions.

name: Direct Sales
description: Involves selling products or services directly to customers through in-person interactions, often using a face-to-face approach.

name: Enterprise Sales
description: Focuses on selling complex, high-value solutions to large corporations, often requiring customized implementations and long-term commitments.

name: Field Sales
description: Involves selling products or services in person, often requiring sales representatives to travel to meet with customers and prospects.

name: Inside Sales
description: Conducts sales activities remotely, using phone, email, or other digital channels to engage with customers and prospects.

name: International Sales
description: Specializes in selling products or services across national borders, requiring knowledge of local markets, regulations, and cultural nuances.

name: Lead Generation
description: Focuses on identifying and qualifying potential customers, often using digital marketing and outreach strategies.

name: Major Account Sales
description: Manages sales to large, strategic accounts, often requiring customized solutions and high-level relationships.

name: Retail Sales
description: Involves selling products directly to consumers through physical stores, online marketplaces, or other retail channels.

name: Sales Engineering
description: Combines technical expertise with sales acumen to provide customized solutions and support to customers.

name: Sales Operations
description: Optimizes sales processes, tools, and analytics to drive efficiency, productivity, and revenue growth.

name: Solution Sales
description: Focuses on selling comprehensive solutions that address specific customer needs, often involving multiple products or services.

name: Telesales
description: Conducts sales activities over the phone, often using scripted pitches and targeted outreach strategies.
